title: Ticket #4747: transfer_input_files doesn't transfer directories on Windows.
description:
On *nix, you can transfer a directory from the submit machine to the root of the job's execute directory by putting a / at the end if the name in transfer_input_files like this. 

   transfer_input_files = send_this_dir/

But on Windows, this syntax results in an error message that erroneously suggests that the directory is not accessible. While this syntax 

   transfer_input_files = send_this_dir\\

Will transfer the directory, but will will transfer it into a subdirectory on the execute machine.

This bug and #3451 can be expected to impact each other.
